phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Book One: Water Chapter Two: The Avatar Returns
You signaled the Fire Navy with that flare!
You are leading them straight to us, are not you?
Yeh, we were on the ship and there was this booby trap and well...
Katara, you should not have gone on that ship.
Now we could all be in danger!
The foreigner is banned from our village!
Sokka, you are making a mistake.
I am keeping my promise to Dad.
I am protecting you from threats like him!
Aang's brought us something we have not had in a long time.
We cannot fight firebenders with fun!
Grandmother, please, do not let Sokka do this.
Katara, you knew going on that ship was forbidden.
I think it best if the airbender leaves.
Where do you think you are going?
Aang is taking me to the North Pole!
Would you really choose him over your tribe?
Katara, I do not want to come between you and your family.
So, you are leaving the South Pole?
Thanks for penguin sledding with me.
Guess I will go back home and look for the airbenders.
Wow, I have not cleaned my room in a hundred years.
Let us see your bison fly now, air boy.
Come on, Appa, you can do it!
Katara, you will feel better after you...
There goes my one chance of becoming a waterbender!
The Fire Nation could be on our shores any moment now!
Sokka, get out of the way!
He would be about this age?
I know you are hiding him!
I have spent years preparing for this encounter.
Well, you are just a teenager.
If I go with you, will you promise to leave everyone alone?
Do not worry, Katara, it will be okay.
Take care of Appa for me until I get back.
Head a course to the Fire Nation.
We have to go after that ship, Sokka.
Aang saved our tribe, now we have to save him.
Why cannot you realize that he is on our side?
If we do not help him, no one will.
I know you do not like Aang, but we owe him and I...
Are you going to talk all day or are you comin' with me?
We are going to save your boyfriend.
What do you two think you are doing?
You have a long journey ahead of you.
It is been so long since I have had hope.
But you brought it back to life, my little waterbender.
And you, my brave warrior, be nice to your sister.
He is the world's only chance.
You both found him for a reason.
Now your destinies are intertwined with his.
There is no way we are going to catch a war ship with a canoe.
You just love taking me out of my comfort zone, do not ya?
This staff will make an excellent gift for my father.
I suppose you would not know of fathers, being raised by monks.
Take the Avatar to the prison hold.
And take this to my quarters.
Hey, you mind taking this to his quarters for me?
So... I guess you never fought an airbender before.
I bet I can take you both with my hands tied behind my back.
Please, Appa, we need your help.
Sokka does not believe you can fly, but I do, Appa.
Do not you want to save Aang?
What was it that kid said?
I mean, big deal, he is flying.
You have not seen my staff around, have you?
Did you see what he just did?
Well, I could not let you have all the glory.
I am just a guy with a boomerang, I did not ask for all this flying and magic.
Good news for the Fire Lord.
The Fire Nation's greatest threat is just a little kid.
That kid, Uncle, just did this.
I will not underestimate him again.
Dig this ship out and follow them!
As soon as you are done with that.
It was the most amazing thing I have ever seen.
I just sort of... did it.
Why did not you tell us you were the Avatar?
But Aang, the world's been waiting for the Avatar to return...
And how am I going to do that?
According to legend, you need to first master water, then earth, then fire, right?
That is what the monks told me.
Well, if we go to the North Pole you can master waterbending.
And Sokka, I am sure you will get to knock some firebender heads on the way.
Then we are in this together.
All right, but before I learn waterbending...
Here we will ride the hopping llamas.
Then waaay over here we will surf on the backs of giant koi fish.
Then back over here we will ride the hog-monkeys.
They do not like people riding them, but that is what makes it fun!
